short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add time tracking and reporting to GitHub issues

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension to add time tracking, reporting and billing to GitHub issues, with optional Pomodoro time tracking functionality. Also works as a standalone time tracking utility without GitHub. This is an open source project; you can check its source code at https://github.com/alpeb/github-timetracking

version 2.0.0:
- Improved notifications.
- Added ability to postpone or completely skip breaks.
- Fixed: couldn't record time in github projects having dashes in their names.

version 1.1.0:
- Added options to be able to change default pomodoro times.
